title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\Action
name: Action
description:
A task to execute on the completion of a job.

See https://cloud.google.com/dlp/docs/concepts-actions to learn more.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.Action

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.save_findings
params.description: Save resulting findings in a provided location.

params.name: data.pub_sub
params.description: Publish a notification to a Pub/Sub topic.

params.name: data.publish_summary_to_cscc
params.description: Publish summary to Cloud Security Command Center (Alpha).

params.name: data.deidentify
params.description: Create a de-identified copy of the input data.

params.name: data.job_notification_emails
params.description: Sends an email when the job completes. The email goes to IAM project owners and technical Essential Contacts.
